verses.text: \w Observe|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w new|strong="H2320"\w* corn, which \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* first \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w spring|strong="H3318"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thou mayst celebrate \w the|strong="H0853"\w* phase \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* thee \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* phase \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w choose|strong="H0977"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w may|strong="H0430"\w* \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w leavened|strong="H2557"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*: \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* shalt thou \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w leaven|strong="H2557"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* affliction, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* thou camest \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* fear: \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thou mayst \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* thy \w coming|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* thy \w life|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w No|strong="H3808"\w* \w leaven|strong="H7603"\w* \w shall|strong="H1366"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy coasts \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H1366"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* \w remain|strong="H3885"\w* until \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*.

Thou mayst \w not|strong="H3808"\w* immolate \w the|strong="H0853"\w* phase \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w any|strong="H0259"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w cities|strong="H8179"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee:

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w choose|strong="H0977"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w may|strong="H0430"\w* \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*: thou shalt immolate \w the|strong="H0853"\w* phase \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*, \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w going|strong="H3318"\w* \w down|strong="H7931"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*, \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w time|strong="H4150"\w* thou camest \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* thou shalt dress, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w it|strong="H0398"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w choose|strong="H0977"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* rising \w up|strong="H0398"\w* thou shalt \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w into|strong="H1980"\w* thy dwellings.

\w Six|strong="H8337"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* shalt thou \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w bread|strong="H4682"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w because|strong="H3117"\w* \w it|strong="H0398"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w assembly|strong="H6116"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, thou shalt \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w*.

Thou shalt \w number|strong="H5608"\w* unto thee \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w weeks|strong="H7620"\w* \w from|strong="H5608"\w* that day, wherein thou didst put \w the|strong="H5608"\w* \w sickle|strong="H2770"\w* \w to|strong="H5608"\w* \w the|strong="H5608"\w* corn.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w celebrate|strong="H2282"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w festival|strong="H2282"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w weeks|strong="H7620"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w voluntary|strong="H5071"\w* oblation \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* thou shalt \w offer|strong="H5414"\w* \w according|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w blessing|strong="H1288"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* thou shalt feast \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, thou, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy manservant, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w maidservant|strong="H0519"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w within|strong="H7130"\w* thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w widow|strong="H0490"\w*, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w abide|strong="H7931"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w*: \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w choose|strong="H0977"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w may|strong="H0430"\w* \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*:

\w And|strong="H5650"\w* thou shalt \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thou wast \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w in|strong="H5650"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: \w and|strong="H5650"\w* thou shalt \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H0428"\w* commanded.

Thou shalt \w celebrate|strong="H2282"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* solemnity \w also|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* tabernacles \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \w when|strong="H3117"\w* thou hast \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* thy fruit \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* barnfloor \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w winepress|strong="H3342"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* thou shalt \w make|strong="H8055"\w* \w merry|strong="H8055"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w festival|strong="H2282"\w* time, thou, thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, thy manservant, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w maidservant|strong="H0519"\w*, \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w* \w also|strong="H0834"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w widow|strong="H0490"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* within thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*.

\w Seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* shalt thou \w celebrate|strong="H2287"\w* feasts \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w choose|strong="H0977"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thee \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy fruits, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* joy.

\w Three|strong="H7969"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w males|strong="H2138"\w* \w appear|strong="H7200"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w choose|strong="H0977"\w*: \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w bread|strong="H4682"\w*, \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w weeks|strong="H7620"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* tabernacles. \w No|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w appear|strong="H7200"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* hands \w empty|strong="H7387"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*:

\w But|strong="H0376"\w* \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w offer|strong="H5414"\w* \w according|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath, \w according|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*.

Thou shalt \w appoint|strong="H5414"\w* \w judges|strong="H8199"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* magistrates \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee, \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w*: \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H0430"\w* \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w just|strong="H0834"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*,

\w And|strong="H4941"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* go \w aside|strong="H5186"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w either|strong="H3588"\w* part. Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w accept|strong="H3947"\w* person \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w gifts|strong="H7810"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w gifts|strong="H7810"\w* \w blind|strong="H5786"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* change \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w just|strong="H4941"\w*.

Thou shalt \w follow|strong="H7291"\w* justly \w after|strong="H0776"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w just|strong="H0834"\w*: \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thou mayst \w live|strong="H2421"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee.

Thou shalt \w plant|strong="H5193"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* grove, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* \w near|strong="H0681"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*:

\w Neither|strong="H3808"\w* shalt thou \w make|strong="H6965"\w* \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w set|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* thyself \w a|strong="H0834"\w* statue: \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w things|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hateth.
